about_the_game:
The preface of "The Boy's Life" is a top-down pixel horror game.

This game tells the story of a girl with a special fate who meets a cat and a mysterious talking body in a different world, and the body and cat help the girl return to the real world.
Gameplay: Players need to control the girl to pass through each level. Due to her special fate, the girl has special skills in a different world, which can help players better avoid monsters and traps.
Enemies: Enemies can be temporarily restricted by the player's skills, but cannot be killed. The enemies here are not the only danger and are also full of traps.
Special mechanisms: Some mechanisms can provide lighting and open paths, but they can also activate some enemies. Players need to make instant route judgments. In addition, there are mechanisms on the map that can accelerate players' movements.
